txt.en: Megorneth has asked you to drive away thieves who have come to plunder her farm.\n\nCorsairs can be found at Munadhor Farm.

'Who are you?! Here to plunder our farm too, are you?'

The younger woman places a gentle hand on the elder's arm and tries to sooth her. CÃºronel says, 'I do not think they're one of the thieves, mother. I think they may be here to help.'

The elder woman glares up at you, saying, 'If that's the case, go kill as many of the thieves as you can! We may not be able to live here anymore, but I won't see our farm plundered!'
With its defender lost at war, Munadhor Farm in Pinnath Gelin has been overrun by beasts and brigands.
You should let Megorneth know that you have defeated many Corsairs at Munadhor Farm.\n\nMegorneth is at Munadhor Farm in Pinnath Gelin.
'Who are you?! Here to plunder our farm too, are you?'
'I am sorry about my mother - well, she was my husband's mother. He was a knight but... he did not return from the war.'
'I am sorry about my mother - well, she was my husband's mother. He was a knight but... he did not return from the war.
'Are they gone? Have you done it?'

'I am sorry about my mother - well, she was my husband's mother. He was a knight but... he did not return from the war.\n\n'Megorneth has been full of rage since, and having our farm overrun by all sorts of beasts and brigands has done nothing to alleviate her pain. I thank you for your help.'

'I am sorry about my mother - well, she was my husband's mother. He was a knight but... he did not return from the war.\n\n'Megorneth has been full of rage since, and having our farm overrun by all sorts of beasts and brigands has done nothing to alleviate her pain. I thank you for your help.'

'Are they gone? Have you done it?'

When you tell her of your deeds, Megorneth slumps with relief, but her eyes lose none of their venom.

'They had it coming! I hope you were thorough!'
